product_name: Patagonia Baby Nano Puff Insulated Jacket - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The Patagonia Nano Puff jacket for little girls is wind- and water-resistant, and highly compressible. This warm jacket can be worn as a mid layer or as outerwear in cold climates. It's weather resistant enough to wear as an insulated shell in a wet snowstorm, trim enough to pull on for chilly hikes and warm enough for light parka duty on a snowy day. Versatile PrimaLoft(R) One polyester insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility. Wind-blocking, moisture-shedding, ripstop polyester shell glides effortlessly whether worn as a middle or outer layer; shell fabric is 70% recycled. Quilt pattern holds insulation in place, promoting durability and longevity; Deluge(TM) Durable Water Repellent finish repels moisture. Full-length zipper with internal draft flap, elasticized cuffs and drawcord hem seal out wind and trap warmth. 2 zip handwarmer pockets with reflective zipper pulls. Regular fit eases layering. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: The Patagonia Nano Puff jacket for little girls is wind- and water-resistant, and highly compressible. This warm jacket can be worn as a mid layer or as outerwear in cold climates.
